trans-unit.source: Provides data for the events: <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall" />, <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall" />.
<xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> contains an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that holds information about the current state of the installation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> contém um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> que contém informações sobre o estado atual da instalação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall>, and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall> event handlers use this information.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall>, e <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall> manipuladores de eventos usam essas informações.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructors and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> construtores e <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> classe.

trans-unit.source: There are two new events called `BeforeCommit` and `AfterCommit`.
trans-unit.target: Há dois novos eventos chamados `BeforeCommit` e `AfterCommit`.

trans-unit.source: The handlers of these events are invoked from the protected methods named `OnBeforeCommit` and `OnAfterCommit` respectively.
trans-unit.target: Os manipuladores desses eventos são chamados de métodos protegidos denominados `OnBeforeCommit` e `OnAfterCommit` respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: These events are raised when the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Esses eventos são gerados quando o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs" /> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs" /> class, and leaves the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState" /> property empty.

The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructors and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> construtores e <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> classe.

trans-unit.source: There are two new events called `BeforeCommit` and `AfterCommit`.
trans-unit.target: Há dois novos eventos chamados `BeforeCommit` e `AfterCommit`.

trans-unit.source: The handlers of these events are invoked from the protected methods named `OnBeforeCommit` and `OnAfterCommit` respectively.
trans-unit.target: Os manipuladores desses eventos são chamados de métodos protegidos denominados `OnBeforeCommit` e `OnAfterCommit` respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: These events are raised when the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Esses eventos são gerados quando o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that represents the current state of the installation.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs" /> class, and specifies the value for the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState" /> property.

The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructors and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> construtores e <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> classe.

trans-unit.source: There are two new events called `BeforeCommit` and `AfterCommit`.
trans-unit.target: Há dois novos eventos chamados `BeforeCommit` e `AfterCommit`.

trans-unit.source: The handlers of these events are invoked from the protected methods named `OnBeforeCommit` and `OnAfterCommit` respectively.
trans-unit.target: Os manipuladores desses eventos são chamados de métodos protegidos denominados `OnBeforeCommit` e `OnAfterCommit` respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: These events are raised when the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Esses eventos são gerados quando o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that represents the current state of the installation.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that represents the current state of the installation.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que representa o estado atual da instalação.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructors and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> construtores e <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs.SavedState%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallEventArgs> classe.

trans-unit.source: There are two new events called `BeforeCommit` and `AfterCommit`.
trans-unit.target: Há dois novos eventos chamados `BeforeCommit` e `AfterCommit`.

trans-unit.source: The handlers of these events are invoked from the protected methods named `OnBeforeCommit` and `OnAfterCommit` respectively.
trans-unit.target: Os manipuladores desses eventos são chamados de métodos protegidos denominados `OnBeforeCommit` e `OnAfterCommit` respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: These events are raised when the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Esses eventos são gerados quando o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> método é chamado.
